Package au.csiro.pathling.terminology

Interface TerminologyFunctions

public interface TerminologyFunctions
Describes the interface to the terminology functions from a library context.

  • Method Details

    • memberOf

      @Nonnull Dataset<Row> memberOf(@Nonnull Column codingArrayCol, @Nonnull String valueSetUri, @Nonnull Dataset<Row> dataset, @Nonnull String outputColumnName)
      Tests whether the codings within the specified column are members of the specified value set. Creates a new column containing the result.
      Parameters:
      codingArrayCol - the column containing the codings to test
      valueSetUri - the URI of the value set to test against
      dataset - the dataset containing the codings
      outputColumnName - the name of the output column
      Returns:
      a new dataset with a new column containing the result
      See Also:
      • Operation $validate-code on ValueSet

    • translate

      @Nonnull Dataset<Row> translate(@Nonnull Column codingArrayCol, @Nonnull String conceptMapUrl, boolean reverse, @Nonnull String equivalencesCsv, @Nullable String target, @Nonnull Dataset<Row> dataset, @Nonnull String outputColumnName)
      Translates the codings within the specified column using a concept map known to the terminology service.
      Parameters:
      codingArrayCol - the column containing the codings to translate
      conceptMapUrl - the URL of the concept map to use for translation
      reverse - if true, the translation will be reversed
      equivalencesCsv - the CSV representation of the equivalences to use for translation
      target - the target value set to translate to
      dataset - the dataset containing the codings
      outputColumnName - the name of the output column
      Returns:
      a new dataset with a new column containing the result
      See Also:
      • Operation $translate on ConceptMap

    • subsumes

      @Nonnull Dataset<Row> subsumes(@Nonnull Dataset<Row> dataset, @Nonnull Column codingArrayA, @Nonnull Column codingArrayB, @Nonnull String outputColumnName, boolean inverted)
      Tests whether one or more of a set of codings subsume one or more of another set of codings.
      Parameters:
      dataset - the dataset containing the codings
      codingArrayA - the column containing the first set of codings
      codingArrayB - the column containing the second set of codings
      outputColumnName - the name of the output column
      inverted - if true, the subsumption test will be inverted
      Returns:
      a new dataset with a new column containing the result
      See Also:
      • Operation $subsumes on CodeSystem

    • build

      @Nonnull static TerminologyFunctions build()
